title: Corporate Financial Risk Warning Model Design and Application Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical analysis, fundamental financial concepts, and experience in programming (Python)
context.additional_context: Establishes data analysis environments using digital devices, providing real corporate financial data samples

learning_goals: Analysis of corporate financial status by applying knowledge graph-based financial risk factor extraction methods.
Understanding the STDE-FG model structure and implementing a basic prediction system using Python libraries.
Reduction of prediction error rates by 20% or more by applying accuracy improvement techniques during model validation.
Preparation of a proposal for corporate financial risk management strategies based on project outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
